Posts.Content: melissamae40 wrote: Hi, My name is Melissa. I'm 40 years old with stage 1a breast cancer. The hardest decision that I have to make is should I have Chemo or not? K167 is 7, Nodes all clear, margins clear, lymph Nodes clear- oncotype dx 22. I have muscular dystrophy, Pompe Disease, chemo can worsen my md severely. Do I rely on the oncotype dx score and worsen my md. I have really bad spine problems.. Is theoretical is a 2.8 percent Benefit! Radiation Therapy 9/2/2014 Breast Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Muscular Dystrophy melissamae40 SpecialK
